ai-ud5.9:1.2_0: At one time the Buddha was wandering in the land of the Kosalans together with a large Saṅgha of mendicants.
ai-ud5.9:1.3_0: Now at that time several students were passing by not far from the Buddha in a teasing manner.
ai-ud5.9:2.1_0: Knowing the meaning of this, on that occasion the Buddha expressed this heartfelt sentiment:
ai-ud5.9:3.4_0: and no-one knows what leads them on.”
